author: dos
msg: the client assumed anything with a content-length header was a list of messages; sending a content-length header for everything (for network i/o instrumentation) broke this assumption; make an equally bad assumption, that still works for now, that lists of messages (and nothing else) will have a content-type of application/x-zip
